comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Possibly James Stetson Metcalfe (1858-1927), drama critic for Life magazine and the Wall Street Journal. www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=71724321 He was the husband of the actress Elizabeth Tyree -- en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Elizabeth_Tyree See a thesis on his criticism at digitalcommons.unl.edu/dissertations/AAI8521452/
